Plot: As a young girl in Japan, Nagiko's father paints characters on her face, and her aunt reads to her from "The Pillow Book", the diary of a 10th-century lady-in-waiting. Nagiko grows up, ...
Language: English, Cantonese, Italian, Japanese, Mandarin, French
Title: The Pillow Book
Writer: Sei Shonagon (book), Peter Greenaway, Sei Shonagon
Actors: Vivian Wu, Yoshi Oida, Ken Ogata, Hideko Yoshida
